title: Sandstorm in a Balloon
summaries: The Sandstorm in a Balloon is an accessory that combines the functions of the Sandstorm in a Bottle and the Shiny Red Balloon. It boosts jump height by 33% and jump speed by 30%, increasing the player's first jump's height to 10.5 tiles, and provides a double jump that can reach a height of 26.5 tiles, for a total height of 37 tiles. Unlike most other double-jump balloons, the Sandstorm Balloon jump will put the player at risk of taking fall damage if they do not cancel it mid-jump or have fall damage immunity (e.g. a Lucky Horseshoe).

Oddly, the total jump height of the Sandstorm in a Balloon is reduced when underwater compared to the Sandstorm in a Bottle, reducing the player's total underwater jump height from 27 tiles to 22 tiles.
